gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 93, Trail Blazers 84
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Trail Blazers, 93-84. Trey Murphy III recorded 24 points (5-8 3PT FG) and five rebounds for the Pelicans, while Brandon Ingram added 17 points, four rebounds and nine assists in the victory. Jerami Grant tallied 24 points, five rebounds and four assists for the Trail Blazers in the losing effort. The Pelicans improve to 31-22 on the season, while the Trail Blazers fall to 15-37.
